Ari and Helene Bousbib collection of photographs
Ari and Helene Bousbib collection of photographs

This subseries contains the work of American photographer Peter Basch (1921â€“2004), known for his images of celebrities and artists in America and Europe. His photos appeared in major magazines such as Life, Look and Playboy.
Included here are images of Jim Henson, Mitzi Gaynor, Fred Gwynn, Rock Hudson, Tuesday Weld, Harry Belafonte, dancers Pauline Koner and Jose Limon, and a series of female nudes.
